DataElement.preferredName: Person Emancipated Minor Or Legal Adult Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the person is an adult or emancipated minor.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Emancipated Minor Or Legal Adult
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A single human being._A person under the age of majority who has been granted the legal status of adulthood._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A person of legal age to consent to a procedure as specifed by local regulation.

Property.preferredDefinition:
A person under the age of majority who has been granted the
legal status of adulthood.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A person of legal age to consent to a procedure as specifed by local regulation.

Concepts.definition: A person under the age of majority who has been granted the legal status of adulthood.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A person of legal age to consent to a procedure as specifed by local regulation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: NCI Thesaurus code: CL003786: Personal Attribute

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
